12.1

12.2
```{r}
BabyNames %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(in_top_100=(rank(desc(count))<=100)) %>%
  group_by(year,in_top_100) %>%
  summarise(total=sum(count)) %>%
  spread(key=in_top_100,value=total) %>%
  mutate(frac=`TRUE`/(`FALSE`+`TRUE`)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(year,frac))+geom_smooth()

```
